name: The Hunsa Magic
description: Take control of a mage with the unique ability of possesing golems, overcome obstacles and puzles reliying on both character sinergies and dismantle the plans of the cult of mages that are trying to awake "The ancient one".

name: Tuk Tuk Extreme Simulator
description: Have you ever drive a Tuk Tuk at max speed through the mountains and dangerous parts of the road?

name: Super Trunko Go
description: Super Trunko Go is a challenging twin stick shooter that takes place in a thrilling space world. Navigate our hero Trunko, and help him restore peace back to the planet!

name: Hacking for Hermann
description: Program artificial intelligences and let them fight against other programs in arenas of this dystopian vision of the future. This game focuses on the fun of coding and tweaking. There is always something to improve.

name: Super Asqr
description: Super Asqr is all about a square, trapped in a collection of mazes and requires your precise maneuver ability to avoid obstacles and deadly hazards, such as red walls, moving orange blocks, lasers, mines and many more.

name: Phil
description: Phil is a 2D roguelike game. Play as an office worker who gets abducted to compete on a saddistic intergalactic TV show, where they're forced to fight their way past a bunch of ridiculous enemies, using a selection of even more ridiclous weapons.

name: Zom Tom
description: Zom Tom is a 2.5D shoot' em up dungeon-crawler where you slay zombie bodies, survive the hell-spawn onslaught, and full send copious amounts of lead downrange.

name: IMA Miner
description: Casual 2D mining game.

name: Grimmlins Tale
description: Grimmlins Tale is an action adventure monster tamer where you catch, train, and bond with all fairy tale inspired monsters. Fight alongside your monster friends in deep, real-time strategic combat, and hop on their backs to explore in the whimsical world of Never Everland.

name: Animals Collision
description: Animals Collision is a party game. Play as humanoid animal and fight for your victory: solo or online up to 4 players. There is no space for other animals on the arena!

name: Kemono Friends: Cellien May Cry
description: A fanfic game of "Kemono Friends". Hack and slash action RPG. You can summon Friends and fight together. There are more than 30 Friends. There are more than 60 types of enemies. There are 4 levels of difficulty, so even people who are not good at action games can enjoy it.

name: Farm Under Fire
description: Farm Under Fire is an online multiplayer 3rd person shooter, with old-school vibe and heavy metal music running in the background! The Devil has come down to Earth to begin mighty FARMING! He possessed the pigs, and now they wreck havoc around the world!

name: Private Property
description: Private Property - the brand new VR zombie shooter set at the end of the XIX century Montana provides endless hours of great fun! This coop multiplayer allows players to team up to jointly defend the Private Property from hordes of Zombies.

name: Saomi
description: Saomi is a little adventurer who likes challenges and exploring new places. In this adventure, Saomi sets out in search of a very rare diamond that was lost in an old family treasure.

name: Insanity Ice
description: You are an ordinary employee of a research laboratory. One of your workdays becomes a horror. Suddenly a nightmare happens and now you have to survive and figure out what's going on here...

name: The Revenge of Mr.Samuel
description: Samuel! The name of the dark evil master god of a distance universe created by himself. 4 fellas felt to this dimension by a huge mistake made by Huseyin –our hero. Help these 4 fellas to return home safely and defeat Samuel if you can!

name: Corridor Sigma
description: 90's-style first-person shooter set in a large alien base filled with angry monsters.

name: Amshay
description: Strategically drop beautiful gems and ugly blobs in an addictive pursuit attempting to capture 100 hideous freaks! Play solo or with a partner in couch co-op. Chase high scores in endless or time attack modes. If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!

name: Magical Girl Celesphonia
description: Amane has always lived for herself, choosing to focus on her studies and happiness. But what will she do when given magical powers beyond human comprehension to face a horde of terrible monsters? It's time for her to become Magical Girl Celesphonia!

name: Roy's Rugs
description: Fulfill your childhood dream and become an infamous intergalactic rug-trader

name: Ardor
description: A hex-grid puzzle-tactics card game. Outwit and outlive your enemies, while upgrading your deck. A lightweight game of bite-sized encounters.

name: Egg Bunny 2
description: You are the Egg bunny which are given tasks by the bunny king to go and collect the eggs that are scattered over the forest. Explore the forest and collect the eggs, return the eggs to the king for a reward.

name: Red Valley
description: "Red Valley" is an adventure and horror game inspired by ps1 classics such as: Silent Hill, Resident Evil, Alone in The Dark...

name: Skellies Ain't Scary
description: Skellies Ain't Scary is a bullet hell rogue-like with minimalist graphics. Delve into dungeons, collect guns and items. Build the strongest synergies and beat all the bosses. Uncover the secrets of the dungeon and collect the lost treasures that await you.

name: Beer Break
description: Very Challenging Medieval themed match 3 game. 400 levels for experienced users who wants the challenge of match 3 games with no help or purchases. The best players might beat all 400 levels.

name: Skyscraper Jump
description: Help the little cube fulfill his dream and jump to the Limit.

name: Mire
description: Mire is a combination of match 3, cards, upgrades and galge. Fight characters in a fantasy setting, get stronger and interact with character in nsfw minigame.

name: Maneater and the Golden Teacher
description: Maneater and the Golden Teacher is a dark and emotional 2D point and click visual novel set in the aftermath of nuclear Armageddon. A post-apocalyptic recon unit recruit makes his first voyage to the surface world and questions the reality of his lifestyle and the underground society he grew up in.

name: Venture Within
description: In Venture Within, a deep-sea roguelite game, you take on the role of Alice Tharp as she enters magically altered hydrothermal vent towers where she must battle against strange creatures and avoid natural hazards to find her mother and her lost research team.

name: Bluem
description: The story of 1 robot and 1 cat

name: The Rusty Sword: Vanguard Island
description: The Rusty Sword: Vanguard Island is a short, top-down adventure game inspired by several 16-bit games.

name: Grim Horde
description: Gather your minions, conquer the lands and become the Darklord! Grim Horde is a fast arcade game with rogue-lite elements, where you lead your armies through the lands of the mortals, raze villages and claim souls. Die and rise again from your ashes and learn new summoning spells.

name: Project Nautilus
description: A first person exploration game set in the not so distant future. Remote operate a drone to explore this newly discovered cave system. Use tools to break away obstacles and propel your way down to find what lies below these long forgotten caves.

name: Agent 01
description: Laura, the daughter of a renowned businessman, hires Markz to rescue her father from a kidnapping. Markz then discovers the captivity location and devises a strategy to safely rescue the businessman.

name: Menace Labs
description: In Menace Labs you control a clone who must achieve a target determined by the lab upon its creation so it can live the remainder of its days freely.

name: Naxos
description: Naxos is like all of my other games! I just feel like there arent many Auto Battle RPGS out there.... I really want to keep moving the genre forward!

name: Defensive Measures
description: Defensive Measures is a FPS/Tower Defense Hybrid game. Deal with your enemies first hand or let your turrets do the talking while you sit back and enjoy the show.

name: DOOM: Slayer's Rampage
description: Prepare to go back to hell, and wipe it out of bad guys, again Slayer's Rampage brings a fast paced experience in the good old Doom and Doom II games, with new guns, monster IA, HUD, Controls and mechanics.

name: Is Simon There?
description: A few months have passed since the death of my son, Simon. Ever since that tragic day, I find myself falling into the darkest emotions I could ever imagine. I am haunted everyday with what I have done; But sometimes, I am haunted by more than just my emotions...

name: Dusted's Pandemonia
description:
Dusted's Pandemonia is a gameplay mod that replaces pretty much all everything, in a classic randomizer fashion.

Inspired by mods like Scalliano's 667 Shuffle, Hard Doom, Complex Doom, and Colorful Hell, this mod aims to provide a new look on the old Realm 667 content you all know and might love, while also coming with its own unique enemies, weapons, items, and special effects.

name: Cyber Car
description: Feel yourself in a futuristic world piloting ships through incredible scenery! Made for VR, Cyber Car will undoubtedly be a relaxing and immersive experience. Put your problems aside, and come ride and enjoy the best virtual reality experience ever made!

name: Hyperbase
description: You find yourself in a mysterious alien base from which no one has ever escaped. Explore the base's perilous inner labyrinths to uncover ancient secrets, escape from this hellish trap, and warn humanity of the impending danger.

name: Miner of Minerals
description: In the exciting game "Miner of minerals" you play as a miner and your task is to dig up as many gems as possible to earn a lot of money. Upgrade your equipment and try to set a record for mining minerals every time!

name: Dash Around Madly
description: Dash Around Madly is a casual game with rogue-lite elements. In the game you will incarnate as a beautiful warrior, control the chess pieces on the board to fight! Mow thousands of enemies until dawn.

name: X4 2022 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: AI War 2: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Lithium
description:
The air is so humid and hot that I've begun sweating. That can't happen. I can't sweat. There isn't anything to sweat. I'm scared. This has to be an illusion... or does reality not matter in this place?

Lithium is a FPS-RPG hybrid building on traditional Doom gameplay with leveling and upgrades, also featuring mechanics such as an inventory system, deadlier enemies, monster mod and multiplayer compatibility, and a sci-fi story shrouded in the supernatural, inspired by games like EYE: Divine Cybermancy, Shin Megami Tensei, and the Touhou series. A significant amount of features are planned still, but the core of the mod is completed.

name: Walpurgis
description:
Walpurgis is...

A gameplay mod that works with Doom, Hexen and Heretic, straight out of the Box!
Focused on giving everything three fire-modes without needing any extra resources, just balancing them around standard blue and green mana/ammo consumption.
Upgrades for each of those afformentioned fire-modes (think Trailblazer).
Strong and fun, but balanced. Extra care has been put into making everything have punch and impact and be fun to use but not the level of overkill. I'm a mad perfectionist when I get going; so repeatedly testing something over and over whilst I tweak values is not unusual.
Gothically medieval, with a taste of moderate-high fantasy. Magic is meant to semi-common in the world, whether through artifacts, or mystical items.
Based around play where you get used to using both your arsenal and your inventory items in tandem. Flechettes and Discs of Repulsion are really useful now; so use them!
Rigorously playtested with custom doom, heretic, and hexen wads to get a feel for how it plays with them; and to see if I can find reason to switch between my arsenal all the time (which is the sign of a good arsenal, in my opinion).
Is named this way because... well, "Hexen" are witches from germanic folklore. Walpurgisnacht is a grand festival for witches in general. So as a festival of new content for Hexen related shenanigans; its doubly relevant.

name: DOOM: Enhanced Vanilla Project
description:
Q: What this mod does?
A: Gives vanilla Doom a fresh coat of paint, while maintaining vanilla gameplay.

name: The Legend of Zelda Redux
description:
Celebrating the 35th Anniversary since the release of the original Legend of Zelda on the Famicom Disk System on February 21st, 1986; and continuing over from the Zelda II Redux hack, The Legend of Zelda Redux (or Zelda 1 Redux) aims to tackle some of the odd designs and programming decisions from the original NES classic to revitalize and give new life to the beloved and cherished classic.

This hack tries to address a lot of points to make the game fit with the rest of the series (and Zelda 2 Redux) by doing some rebalancing and QoL changes, and also some visual flare into the game, without compromising the original game’s design. Be sure to check the full Changelog inside the ReadMe file for the full list of changes made to this hack, and also don’t forget to check the optional patches too!

name: Dedalium
description:
Dedalium is an innovative RPG game which can be played on any website installing the browser extension, but there is a lot to do on the app as well!

The first steps of the game consists on selecting your initial gear, this gear will get experience when you fight and complete missions and will become more powerful. You will be able to find new gear on mystery boxes.

name: Dashing Mariachis
description:
Dashing Mariachis is a Mexican culture inspired game, situated in early 20th
century and heavily relying in Mariachi music with a subtle 8bit treatment, puts the player inside a 3D side-scrolling runner adventure with a gameplay shift at the ending of every stage where now the player has to hit musical notes accordingly in order to keep the Serenata (musical performance) running.

name: Phelios
description:
Phelios consists of seven chapters, and in each, you must defeat Typhon's minions using your sword which can emit fireballs at them. However, holding the fire button down for a few seconds will charge the sword; and upon releasing it, it shoots a larger fireball that does a fair amount of damage. During the game, you collect items that increases your speed and give you more firepower.

At the end of each chapter, you have to destroy a boss in order to proceed to the next one. Between each chapter, you can watch an intermission that details what is happening at the temple.

name: Unreal Engine The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: A fan recreation of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with updated graphics, made using the Unreal Engine.

name: Dark Hyrule Fantasy
description:
Dark Hyrule Fantasy is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time with the goal of telling a new story, in which a new threat emerges in Hyrule, plaguing the survival of all that lives. As this threat emerges, a light will shine bright in darkness.

Development on the mod was cancelled and the game started being reworked into a new original game called "Dark Haven Fantasy" using the Godot engine.

name: Batman & Robin
description: A game for the Tiger Game.com.

name: Centipede
description: A port of Centipede for the Tiger Game.com.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
description:
Duke Nukem 3D for the Tiger Game.com is a handheld first-person shooter inspired by the PC version, though it is profoundly different from the original.

It plays more like a dungeon crawler rather than an FPS due to Game.Com's hardware limitations. The player can only move Duke forward, backwards, strafe left or right, one screen at a time. By pressing B or C the player can turn Duke to shoot left or right, but can't turn him to face that direction and move.

name: Frogger
description:
A port of Frogger for the Game.com.

The Frogger version for Game.com features two variations within the cartridge. The first version mirrors the original arcade game, where the objective is to guide five frogs, one at a time, across a bustling street and a river to reach their designated homes safely. The second version is an enhanced edition, incorporating newer levels. Some levels consist of only two segments of river or road, while others present a single extensive stretch of road without a designated safe zone in the centre. Additionally, Game.com allows up to four players to participate, taking turns during gameplay.

name: Indy 500
description: A racing game for the Game.com.

name: Jeopardy!
description: Quiz game for the Game.com based on the homonymous TV show.

name: Lights Out
description: A puzzle game for the Game.com. Based off of the electronic toy game of the same name.

name: Monopoly
description: A port of the Monopoly board game for the Game.com.

name: Mortal Kombat Trilogy
description: A port of Mortal Kombat Trilogy for the Game.com.

name: Quiz Wiz: Cyber Trivia
description: A quiz game for the Game.com.

name: Scrabble
description: A version of the board game Scrabble for the Game.com.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: A game based on the Wheel of Fortune TV show for the Game.com.

name: Williams Arcade Classics
description: A port of Williams Arcade Classics for the Game.com that includes the Arcade games: Robotron: 2084, Joust, Sinistar, Defender and Defender II.

name: Aetheris
description: Go on an adventure to save your village from a voracious Shade. Alone or accompanied, this turn-based roguelite will take you on a journey through a world of incomparable and colourful landscapes.

name: SMYS: Show Me Your Stairs
description: SMYS is a 2-4 player local-multiplayer party game. Challenge your friends in this building race to the top! Gather blocs in various minigames and then use them to build your stairs as fast as possible, use your special items wisely to disturb your friends' minds and capture the flag first.

name: Look Inside: Chapter 2
description: Manon has found a new notebook that goes deeper in the life of her family. Discover this new chapter of looK INside and enjoy the memories of a French family from 1960 to nowadays through unique puzzles based on empathy and aesthetic sense.

name: Mage Noir
description: Mage Noir is a strategy card game. Become true Mages and fight with the power of the elements. Craft your spells and make good use of the shared Mana pool to defeat your opponent.

name: Fay's Factory
description: Fay’s Factory is a strategy-rpg. Build a factory and produce complicated spells for your visionary sorceress, argue to the death with both the elites and the working class, travel the world of the magical industrial revolution, and damn — try to make a living among this mess.

name: Bounda
description: A 2D physics game. In the game，you will control a red panda or cat to defeat cunning greedy enemies, and protect kind animals and beautiful nature, by press release and drap mouse. Press left button of mouse or "P" key to pause game.

name: Project Apax
description: Join Laia and Evan, two young graduated Apprentices from the Kingdom of Agni, in their adventure to face the powerful Kingdom of Gea. The echoes of a dark past return to threaten all we know, unless the prophecy of the Anointed comes true.

name: Phantom Racing
description: Welcome to Phantom Racing – A Racing Game where you can compete with your Friends. Create your own Racer and show the World, that you have what it takes to reach the Top. Create your own Team, recruit new Drivers from all around the World and compete in Live Tournaments and much more.

name: Rendezvous: Shadows of the Past
description: He can't escape the memories that haunt him, and soon Setyo realizes he must return to Neo-Surabaya to save what's left of his family. Experience the upheaval of Setyo's mundane life in Bay City in this action-adventure prologue to Rendezvous.

name: Technobog
description: Hack and slash through the web of the corporate network in this merciless fast-paced 3D roguelite that blends freedom of movement and creative combat.

name: BlackSky
description: Travel from one solar system to the other in this space action puzzle game. Match tiles to fire your ship's deadly weapons at a multitude of monsters. Upgrade your ship and its weapons to fight stronger enemies

name: Beat Hazard 3
description: Are you ready to explore your music collection mapped as a stunning galaxy of wonders? Experience your music collection as never before with this intense music driven twin stick shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.

name: Dragon Ball: Kachinuke! Tenkaichi Budokai
description: A handheld electronic game based on the anime series.

name: Dokodemo Dorayaki Doraemon
description: Handheld game based on the Doraemon franchise.

name: Wika Wicked's Egg
description: Dare to be Queen Wika's courier in Wika Wicked's Egg; the most dangerous side-scrolling platform adventure in all the fairy lands. Can you, the mere fairykin sprite Lil' Sebastien, bring her this precious, fragile egg before the forces of darkness overwhelm the land & seal her kingdom forever?

name: Master of War: Rule of Power
description: Dynamic turn-based strategy game inspired by the hyper hardcore genre, where the player as a chief man of his tribe, will lead it to the glory, watch out for food and lurking predators!

name: Locks
description: Locks is a horror puzzle-platformer set in a puppet show. The game features a new type of puzzle and a fresh way to scare you. Are you a spectator, participant, or victim?

name: Arkell
description: Adventurer! Oh, how glad am I to see you here. Our world is destroyed, captivated by the Demon Lord Agatheus. You must help us, angel from the heavens. You must stop Agatheus, or we may never breathe again...

name: Arto
description: Fight through unique biomes against challenging enemies and bosses as you piece together the mysteries of a broken world, in an action role-playing experience that paints a new path.

name: Tower of Cards
description: Tower of Cards is a card based PvP and PvE tower defense game.

name: Shape Puzzle
description: Relaxed puzzle game with challenging riddles. Combine, rotate and move different shapes to reach the next level. Solve several puzzles at the same time, but be careful not to destroy your progress by unwary changes.

name: Age of Discovery
description: A top down 2D fantasy game

name: Boating Simulator 2022
description: You would think that the day would never come where a simulator game could make you want to go out and buy a boat, or better yet actually take up boating as a hobby, you were wrong. ~Joystick compatible~

name: Cats Love Boxes
description: Help Fofiño and Lily to move the boxes around in this co-op puzzle adventure.

name: Rhythm Knights: Double Treble
description: Play as the Rhythm Knights in this hand-drawn colorful rhythm fighter reimagining. Featuring tons of levels, a brand new input system, and online multi-player. This package also contains a full remastered version of the original game! This is the ultimate Rhythm Knights package!

name: Bullet Quest
description: Defend against waves of ever increasing enemies by harvesting resources then building up a base and your defenses. Takes place in a bleak mechanical dystopia were the factory reigns supreme.

name: BurgerTime
description: A handheld port of BurgerTime.

name: So to Speak
description: Can you learn a language by solving puzzles? So to Speak is a simulation game about wandering around Japan, looking at signs, overhearing conversations, and using context clues in the environment to figure out what it all means. No background in Japanese is assumed.

name: Urubu
description: Urubu is an Online co-op, payload & Gestion Elements. You play as recruits from the lastest division in their final test to join the ranks of Urubu

name: HyperNova
description: A 2D side-scrolling shooter in which you advance by defeating enemies in a world where everything is made of voxels. Defeat enemies, collect reinforcement items, and take on powerful enemies that appear one after another!

name: Border Town
description: 2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game. Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

name: Invercity
description: Invercity is a puzzle-platformer that features Handstand. Handstand looks like hanging when you look it upside down, doesn't it? This game really makes it look that way. A reporter who loves handstand follow the mystery while reporting the "Handstand Phenomenon" in the city.

name: Game of Seven
description: Game of Seven is an original two-player turn-based board game that revolves around the number 7. In this game you will command seven angels that move in patterns of the number 7, on a seven by seven board.

name: Letux Game
description: Letux Game is a 2D Top-Down action rogue-like with powerful bosses and awesome upgrades.

name: BurgerTime
description: The second port of BurgerTIme for handheld.

name: Forest Grump
description: The cheesy space schnitzel, monsters and guns, old smackdonald, freaky forest, killing friends, or the first day in forestry. Name it whatever you want, the ultimate action-packed FPS/CTF/RPG is here. Plus, this game is funny as hell. Start playing today!

name: My Furry Maid
description: Welcome home, master! Would you like tea, coffee or a hot maid for dinner? Oh, wait, we've run out of tea and coffee, so...

name: Rgby
description: Rgby is 4 players local multiplayer Co-op game. Run around on screen and dodge bullets. Destroy your enemies with friends!

name: Cold Engines
description: Cold Engines is an RTS where you need to survive in a harsh frost environment and defeat your enemy. Build a warm base for your people where they refuel their tanks, steal frozen or damaged wrecks and pull them to your base, ambush and attack while using the freezing world as your advantage.

name: I am Sakuya: Touhou FPS Game
description: Dodge bullets, shoot enemies and even stop time as you navigate through 10 beautiful levels in this perfect blend of bullet hell and FPS. Uncover the origins of Sakuya Izayoi's past and investigate the mansion where the scarlet vampires resides in this Touhou Project Fangame!

name: Warlord: Britannia
description: Lead a Roman expeditionary force into the heart of Ancient Britain! Recruit, promote, and upgrade your legionaries while constructing a series of fortified marching camps. Use Roman tactics and strategies to conquer the entire island and become Warlord!

name: Sea Horizon
description: "Sea Horizon" is a Roguelike turn-based RPG. You can explore the world by choosing different characters. Every journey can be unique and legendary. But don't forget the darkness is lurking. Choose your path wisely because every single step is essential.

name: Leviathan's Sword
description: It's a bullet hell rogue-lite with pirates, swords and a massive amount of treasure!

name: Dino-D
description: The game is well suited for children, it develops logical thinking and reaction, even playing solo, controlling 2 heroes at the same time develops the brain and forms new neural connections.

name: Light of the Past
description: Light of the Past is a 2D platformer in pixel style. Here you will need the ability to move well and think quickly.

name: Meth Master
description: Are you ready to build your own drug empire?

name: Space Egg Shooter
description: Space Egg Shooter: Inspired by classic arcade games, sidescroller shooter invites you to plunge into the thick of space battles!

name: The Dark Heart of Balor
description: Archdemon Balor has opened the Gate of Hell into the human realm and hordes of demons and monsters have flooded into your world destroying everything in their path. You must protect those who are still alive and ultimately destroy Balor to close the Gate.

name: Last Day: Zombie Survival VR
description: A stranger, who awakens in a room with no recollection of how they got there, soon discovers they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious unknown person.

name: Abyss King
description: The abyss In the bottomless dark abyss, Xiao Wei lights up the lights, attracting the attention of the surrounding creatures, and the sound of footsteps approaching quickly to support this luminous object , light the path, and work together to find the way out of the abyss..

name: Eshe's Wish Adventure
description: Help a Eshe the cat find coins to her get her greatest wish! Eshe's Wish Adventure is a casual side scroller game developed for charity. Eshe can jump on enemies, explore the world of wishes, travel through portals, and eventually earn her greatest wish!

name: M.O.O.D.S.
description: M.O.O.D.S. is a Roguelite shooter with Robots fighting using the powers of Emotions. Blast crazy mechs with a myriad of Weapon x Addins combinations. Talk to Bosses to change their combat style. Change your Basic Skills with dozens upgrades. Play solo or with friends!

name: River Rush
description: River Rush is reminiscent of old vertically scrolling shoot’em up games. Remember them ? It is time to catch up with nostalgia. Make your youth experience alive again! OR here is a chance to catch up with your father's nostalgia. Take a chance and see what are we talking about!

name: Duline
description: A simple yet challenging geometric puzzle game

name: Cactus Cowboy: Plants at War
description: When the bug army attacked Cacti Island, the Cacti Army deployed you into battle. Together with your comrade Emilio, you fight many battles in the trenches, cities, and woods of Cacti Island, unraveling the story behind the backstabbing attack of the bug army.

name: Universe Apart
description: Universe Apart is a twin-stick 2d horror space exploration shooter with rogue-like elements. Venture out and fight your way through space ships, mining stations and asteroids to scavenge weapons, resources, duct tape and new crew mates: Find a planet and seed it - or die trying.

name: The Neroe
description: Action-adventure roguelike game in which you can catch and control creatures. Explore the open world, find the secrets, get items and complete the dungeons. Play solo or local multiplayer: each player makes his own adventure!

name: Disharmonia
description: Disharmonia is a first person exploration game. Your decision will play a big role in the development of the whole game. You will play as Tony, you will explore and discover special places beyond your reality. You will try to find an end, but the game will never end.

name: Army of One
description: Army of One is a first and third person shooter style game based on teams and solo confrontations, with melee combat and objective-oriented multiplayer gameplay. Prove to everyone that you are the best, that you are literally a one-man army, for rewards and abilities.

name: Black Ink
description: A hand-drawn action video game about love, weapons, comedy, more weapons, penguins, a2 + b2 = c2, and lots of weapons!

name: Grid Miner
description: Grid Miner is a real-time strategy puzzle game where you mine asteroids to gather resources and expand your space station. Unlock new tools and utilities as you progress through levels. Maintain your quotas and learn more about your employer and coworkers at Hypergo Industries.

name: Underliner
description: An unusual combination of lollipops and bullets invites you to a world full of surprises.

name: Hotel Manager Simulator
description: You have been hired as a hotel manager. Now it is the time to prove yourself that you can bring benefits to the hotel while keeping hotel customers happy as much as possible by satisfying their appropriate needs. Good luck, fellows!

name: Dere-chat
description: An Interactive Visual Novel with 35 story branches, 150 unique lines of dialogue, unlockable skins and many wholesome vibes! Dere-chan is always kind, happy, and energetic so whatever happens she'll always be there with kindness and support!

name: Fists of Invokers
description: Fight online with friends and strangers in different stages and become the last one standing.

name: Spell Welders
description: Sin descripción

name: Gnome Online
description: Gnome Online is an innovative, Real-Time, fast-paced, PvP, Sandbox MMORPG.

name: Homemade TCG
description: Yugi-inspired card game -roguelike with an extra deck. Enemies use the same cards / rules as you. Reduce opponent's life from 20 to 0; by playing cards and attacking. Pick a card of 3-choices after each win. Use the deck-builder between games. A lot of unique cards, 5 floors, and the final boss.

name: All Songs are From the King
description: A game where Silent Hills meets Kahlil Gibran’s ‘The Prophet’.

name: Heroes of Book & Paper
description: HB&P s an old-school RPG game that uses an 80s/90s style of design and concept. Your decisions will determine the ending of each adventure you take. Every story has different and random components. This means that the stories will vary from game to game.

name: Farmer Against Potatoes Idle
description: Pick up your sword and fight off waves of Potatoes by upgrading your stats constantly, use Equipment, choose between different Classes, put your many Talents to good use, and so much more designed to keep you entertained for a long time.

name: Sexy Mystic Survivors
description: Roguelite bullet-hell combat meets sexy anime action in Sexy Mystic Survivors, as you rise to the occasion to help gorgeous heroines destroy countless invading monsters. Plan your builds, upgrade heroines, and survive against the clock. Keep the heroines alive and they’ll be sure to reward you!

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Extra Area: Atelier Plachta
description: Plachta as the main character! An additional story episode with young Plachta as the main character, set in the time after she arrived in Erde Wiege and before she first met Sophie. Players will play as Plachta, with Diebold and Ramizel available as party members.

name: Heartstop
description: Heartstop is an emotional, story-driven game, taking place in a world where every living being has suddenly stopped moving. Uncover the mystery of this eerie event while building a dynamic relationship between the only two people remaining, through the many impactful and hard-hitting choices.

name: Lab
description: Deep underground in an old laboratory, an animal wakes up. Invisible enemies blocking the way, complex old underground facilities, narrow ducts... Lead the helpless lone animal to escape to the ground floor.

name: Cowardice
description: This is a horror and decryption game. The style is 2D pixel cartoon. There are five chapters to explore. Each chapter has new maps and music. There are three enemies. They all have two stages and six chasing music. They need to constantly avoid the pursuit of the enemy until the end

name: Night of Love
description: Some things may seem unforgivable at the first, but a long night spent together may change everything and bring back the forgotten feelings...

name: Taiga
description: Taiga is an atmospheric first person horror game with elements of survival. Explore the maze like forest, Uncover dark secrets that lay beneath pine and spruce. Save your colleagues if you can, but most importantly. Escape with your life.

name: Mark's Magnificent Marble Maze
description: Unwind from the stress of daily life with this magnificent marble maze. Sometimes all you need is a place to let your mind wander.

name: Light Bringer
description: Light Bringer is a 2D side scrolling fantasy strategy game with development elements. Explore, gather, build and then when night falls, survive! All in the style of beautiful hand-painted graphics. Will you bring the light?

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Classic Character Pack
description: Play as the classic LEGO variants of Luke, Leia, Han, Lando and Darth Vader in LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga. Explore the galaxy as iconic characters based on the original LEGO minifigures from 1999.

name: Red Flowers
description: A lightning-fast action platformer in which the enemy always outnumbers you, and the cost of a mistake is death. Slice your way through the dystopian stone jungle with a transformer katana, shredding heavily armed opponents in a stylish super-fast manner.

name: The Great Ocean
description: Dive into adventure-missions in the earth’s oceans. Explore in your high-tech submarine fascinating spots like the Galapagos or the Deep Sea. Use your upgradeable tools to solve quests when you free jailed whales, or explore sunken WW2 battleships. Swim with majestic whales, sharks and sea turtles. And take real action to save the oceans.

name: Gravitar: Recharged
description: The cult classic Gravitar has been Recharged. Complete missions in each solar system, navigating a variety of challenging environments, each with varying levels of gravity that will test your skills as a pilot before unlocking new solar systems to explore.

name: The Airline Project: Next Gen
description: Set up a widespread network and gain as much market share as possible in the era of your choice using your favorite aircraft in this offline airline tycoon. Do you have what it takes to coordinate an airline?

name: The Immortal
description: This is running game in 2D Platformer, enemies will appear on the way, kill them all if you want to reach the end of the land, Lung Cu. You have to focus on the game 100%, just one hit of enemy everything will back to the beginning.

name: Gates of Nesphera
description: Cepheus Gate VR is a roguelite inspired dungeon crawler. Explore vast corridors, fight against powerful Keepers and use deadly power of Nebula to grow in strength. Be careful though, the mighty power is treacherous and can devour you if not used wisely.

name: Spe:x
description: You are Ilie, an Eastern European Entrepreneur who is starting a new company of building PCs. You love computers and building them since you were a kid and now you think it will be a good idea to make your family proud and start your own business with money borrowed from unconventional sources.

name: The Farmer's Story of Slow Life
description: The sisters inherited the ranch and the mountains from their father's estate. But the island is no longer vibrant. You set out to rebuild the ranch and the town. When you have gathered enough assets, you can visit remote islands far away. You will surely find unknown items waiting for you.

name: Elemental
description: 'Elemental' is a psychological horror game where every detail matters. Prepare yourself for an experience in which your morals will be tested and your sanity condemned.

name: Legacy of Sin: Blood Oath
description: Buy unique troops, control the battlefield, defend the routes from different enemies! Hand drawn frame by frame 2D animation!

name: Dungeoneer
description: Dungeoneer is a top-down action RPG with auto-attack style combat where you progress by exploring and completing dungeons. Choose from up to 6 classes and 6 skills to create your custom hero. Play solo or with up to 4 players.

name: Grid Legends: Seneca & Ravenwest Double Pack
description: The Seneca & Ravenwest Double Pack unlocks 4 exclusive cars (Aston Martin Vantage GT4, Porsche 962C, Ginetta G55 GT4, Koenigsegg Jesko), along with more Career events and bonus customization items.

name: Super Ride Grandpa
description: Race your grandpa against other grandpas (and goompahs).

name: Fire the Zombies
description: This is a Guard Game, you can control the gun o fire,There are multiple styles of zombies and bosses need you to destroy. Different weapons have different powers, come and experience it.

name: Glorious Day to Die
description: Hardcore shooter where you will have to repel the attacks of the alien monsters using the various weapons and a dog, which can sniff invisible enemies.

name: Timestride
description: Manipulate time to overcome obstacles in a clever way. A sci-fi FPS game with large variety of weapons and foes set in a remote military research lab where an experiment has gone horribly wrong.

name: Sakura Succubus 6
description: The sixth part of the Sakura Succubus series. Hiroki thought his harem of adoring women couldn’t get any bigger, but now a genuine European princess had taken a liking to him. What’s a (disgustingly) popular guy to do?!

name: Covid Carl
description: Covid Carl is a Metroidvania/Contra-style 2d side-scrolling shooter. It will feature a brief story, 10 levels, and boss fights

name: Moonphase Pass
description: A rougelite meeple placement game. Help Lili as she fights back against the Red Moon to protect her forest hut!

name: One Way Trip
description: Stealth will be your only defense in this 1-4 player Sci-fi horror scenario while you attempt to escape an ever learning AI. Be quite, stay hidden, and remain calm, or face certain death.

name: Heroes of Rome 2: The Revenge of Discordia
description: Caesar and Cleopatra were kidnapped by the Roman goddess Discordia! Don't waste time and go on a journey full of adventure, myths and legends.

name: Prism: A Visual Novel
description: On her way to the city of opportunity, a young Freyja is trapped when a sudden fog descends upon the town known as Avon-On-Reach. Soon, she starts to wonder if there's more to the fog than meets the eye, and if it has a connection to the strange monstrous happenings around the town.

name: Tales of Inca 2: New Adventures
description: Join the Incas on their exciting journey, fight against demons and mystical monsters and experience exciting adventures!

name: Basureroes: Invasion
description: “Basureroes: Invasion” is a 2D platform game with retro aesthetics in which a group of heroes with different abilities must save the world from an alien invasion. Run, jump and fight your way through twenty levels full of danger and epic boss fights.

name: Squish
description: A spoopy, squishy, and fast-paced party game where you and up to three gooey friends rave it up in an underground crypt as it collapses down on you. You must push blocks, dodge, and jump to survive the rave and squish your opponents. Last Skelegoo standing takes it all!

name: Superola: Champion Edition
description: A challenging runner-style platforming adventure, in which you’ll have to guide a burger loving llama in its quest to defeat the Hotdog Aliens and recover the stolen hamburgers... before they get cold!

name: Nectar
description: An explosive Shoot ‘Em Up like no other, Nectar focuses on five hummingbird sisters, each with their own playstyle. Defeat powerful bosses, unlock new cosmetics, compete in online leaderboards, and save your world from the invading bee army!

name: Find All 3: Travel
description: Look for hidden cats, raccoons, other animals and objects, color this painted world. You have to go on an exciting journey through different levels. More than 1500 items of varying difficulty are waiting for you!

name: School Sweets Discovery: Granulated Sugar Edition
description: A beautiful girl 2-choice quiz adventure game where you can experience a little variety of languages! Enjoy multi-end collection and online ranking in Challenge Mode!

name: Pixel Game Maker Series Fish Tornado
description: A simple action game that all you need is your left stick! Turn your fish into a giant swarm and take down your enemies!

name: My Student Loves Me!
description: A short visual novel VR for adults where the story and play changes depending on your choices! You can become a tutor and fall in love with your student. Your student loves you and confesses her love to you. Let's make out as much as you want!

name: Kami-sama's Personal Servant
description: The story of the relationship between a god and a young sacrificed boy, Kami-sama's Personal Servant. A mysterious fukichi na kami (god who brought bad luck) with a mysterious past who lived in the mountains and an orphan boy who was a descendant of an outsider and had been chosen as a sacrifice. What would happen between them?

name: Gardenia VR
description: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: Valera: The Drunken Lobster
description: A simple and relaxing arcade game about a lobster called Valera and his attempts to collect bottles deep in the ocean.

name: My Naughty Summer Vacation: Days in Countryside and Memories of Summer
description: An 3D simulation RPG in which the main character returns to the countryside and enjoys his summer vacation. Let's spend a special summer in the countryside with heroines, by talking, go to various places with countryside, playing, and others, while making memories of the summer.

name: Nightmare: The Origins - Curse of Night
description: A single-player story, dive into the paranormal

name: Zetria
description: Zetria is a pixel/retro style platformer with action and puzzle elements. Help Solana jump, shoot and think her way through the perils and dangers ahead to rescue the missing facility workers!There are nine levels in total, and a few secret areas to find and unlock too.

name: Grow the Hell up by Dusty Lane
description: Grow The Hell Up by Dusty Lane is an absurd adventure VR game. Solve unique physics puzzles, decipher codes, find hidden items... and try your best to act like an adult.

name: The Backrooms: Found Footage
description: The Backrooms: Found Footage is a psychological horror game where you "no-clip" through reality and into the Backrooms. Explore 600 million miles of randomly generated office space, contend with entities, collect unique and useful lore, and attempt to maintain your sanity as you try to escape.

name: Scarlet Maiden
description: Join Scarlet, the last remaining Maiden of the Sacred Flame, in her sinful quest to defeat the Prime Evil. Explore the randomly generated dungeons of the Underworld, learn new abilities, equip Scarlet with powerful equipment, and engage in lewd activities along the way.

name: Vivaland
description: Vivaland is the first life simulation game built with co-op in mind from the ground up. The game allows up to 8 players to live in the same town and engage with each other. Players can create and control their characters, establish families, build homes, and perform various daily activities such as sleeping, eating, and working. In addition, the game features multiplayer events and world aspects that encourage players to collaborate and play together.

name: Legend of Keepers: Soul Smugglers
description: Including new master, new monsters, new game mechanics and more!

name: Aery: Last Day of Earth
description: “Aery: Last Day of Earth” is a story-driven 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bird that is on its non-violent journey through time, space, and different dimensions to discover an alternative reality for our planet.

name: Unwording
description: Unwording is a narrative puzzle game about happiness, gratitude, and the power of words. Use a combination of exploration and word puzzle gameplay to reshape reality and guide Tom through the course of three painful but transformative days of his life.

name: Rule No. 2
description: Rule and the greatest warm-up game are back for seconds! Kickstart your eyes, limbs and otherwise general biology from the vestiges of normal (boring) human behavior and become honed and sharpened as you battle an onslaught of Waifus and Geometry for your position on the Leaderboard!

name: The Divine Speaker: The Sun and the Moon
description: The story-rich 18+ prequel to The Divine Speaker. Follow alongside a younger Aemyl as he uncovers the world for himself!

name: Chroma + Elektron
description: Chroma + Elektron is a 2D twin-stick shooter. Return all chromatic energy back to its proper state. Survive against increasingly difficult waves of constructs and collect their energy to unleash powerful weapons and abilities. Your speed and power will know no equal.

name: Quest Room
description: The main goal of the quest is to get out of the room, and for this you need to solve riddles and find hidden clues.

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress
description: In this tactical game, use logic programming to solve puzzles and beat each level. Gather unique skills, use visual programming, automate your character and defeat your enemies! Choose wisely and enjoy this adventure!

name: Late Photographer 4
description: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood

name: Flashout III
description: Flashout is back! Where high speed meets high stakes. Where unforgiving combat, loud electronic music and addictive boosts of adrenaline mix up to separate winners from losers. Where gravitation is nothing more than an empty word. Take part in an exciting, head-to-head fight to the finish!

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Mahjong Solitaire
description: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to tile-matching mahjong solitaire! Clear the playfield and unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: Deck Adventurers: Heroes of the Valley
description: Save the Valley from the hordes of monsters that ravage it in this turn-based tactical combat and deck-building RPG game.

name: Ferrum inc
description: Become an operator who controls a robot of Ferrum inc. Participate in 5-by-5 battles where you can choose your fighting machine and use a unique camera control system. Time to spill the oil!

name: Impulse Rogue
description: Impulse Rogue is a punishing souls-like action RPG. Master combat, face relentless enemies, venture fractured mind, explore twisted landscapes, unravel forgotten mysteries, confront lurking demons. Will you succumb to darkness, or emerge victorious? a pure soul's fate hangs in the balance.

name: Save Room: Organization Game
description: When you enter a save room you know you are safe, no danger can come to you, you can relax. Take advantage of this short period of time to organize your inventory, heal your wounds and reload your weapons. Can you make all the items fit in your inventory?

name: Solitaire Match 2 Cards. Thanksgiving Day
description: Solitaire Match 2 Cards. Thanksgiving Day Card Game is a card game with a cozy autumn atmosphere! 120 new levels await you!

name: Monster Energy Supercross 5: The Official Videogame - Legends Pack Vol. 2
description: Race back in time and compete with the champions of the past with the Legends Pack Vol. 2!

name: Toilet Chronicles
description: Toilet Chronicles - is a public toilet simulator with mystical setting where you need to find a way out of the toilet with the help of your toilet neighbor. Find a way to escape with your partner until one of you dies. Every choice you make brings you to a different outcome.

name: Soul
description: This is a brain-burning puzzle game, with well-designed puzzles everywhere, find clues, analyze the hidden meanings in the clues, solve the puzzles, and finally unlock the secrets of the whole world. Let your brain turn at a high speed, ding, and enjoy the thrill of solving the puzzle!

name: Biomisland
description: Biomisland is a relaxing minimalist nature builder game. Visit randomly generated islands and restore nature as your own pace using diverse plants at your disposal.

name: Solitaire: Beautiful Garden Season
description: Garden season, whenever you want! "Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season offers hours of challenging gameplay.

name: Old World: Heroes of the Aegean
description:
Old World's first expansion Heroes of the Aegean gives you control of Ancient Greece's greatest leaders and warriors. Lead Athens to victory in the Battle of Marathon, defend Greece from a Persian invasion as Leonidas and his 300 Spartans, and conquer the Hellenic world as Alexander the Great himself in a series of scenarios spanning over 200 years of classical history.

Heroes of the Aegean also adds the Hittites as a brand-new civilization playable in the main campaign and led by the warrior king Ḫattušili I. The Hittites field powerful and unique three-man chariots and gain extra civics thanks to their status as the world's first known constitutional monarchy. Additionally, their entire unit roster has the special ability to cross hills without movement penalties and the ability to chop down forests, reflecting the Hittites experience in the rugged Anatolian landscape and their record of deforestation. With all of these advantages, the Hittites are poised to take the Old World by storm.

name: SCP: Event Classified
description: SCP: Event Classified is a unique horror shooter that allows players to take on a role of a soldier, prisoner, scientist and even monster. Fight other players or unite with them to survive in this mysterious facility.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 8
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 8!

name: BrVR: Backrooms Virtual Reality
description: BrVR: Backrooms VR is a virtual reality survival horror game inspired by The Backrooms. The Backrooms are out of the boundaries of the real world and can only be accessed by no-clipping through a floor or wall in a place that inspires deja vu or an uncomfortable feeling of nostalgia.

name: NMDC
description: Your token, character sheets, and maps are endlessly customizable so you can adapt games to fit your quests, or create your own rules from scratch. Spark adventure, foster creativity, forge friendships, and unite tabletop communities across the globe with games that are easy to play.

name: On the Wings: Birth of a Hero
description: You are not born as a Hero. But you can become one! Bruce and Ursula are sister and brother living with their mother. One day their life starts to change with a Dragon. Now, it is time to become a Hero by saving their village and their captive father from Dark Rider. Get ready for a nice RPG story.

name: Dash and Slash
description: Slash and Dash through your enemies in this pixel-art, one-button, hack and slash! Cut through the city, break into its' heart and descend to its' depths.

name: The Old Forest
description: The Old Forest is an open world RPG with dungeon crawling, exploration, crafting, survival mechanics and loot! Slash, sneak or cast your way through the ominous forest, catacombs, ruins, caves and dungeons to uncover why the forest spirits are angry and how to bring an end to the endless winter.

name: Otherworld Legends: Hannah
description: Sin descripción

name: Survivor Cells
description: Discover the beauty and fragility of life in Survivor Cells, a unique survival game against viruses and bacteria, which strategically combines the elements of roguelite, bullet hell and tower defense in a challenging experience. Your destiny depends on your agility and choices. How far will you get?

name: Paranormal Simulator
description: As a paranormal investigator, your job is to discover the magical properties of anomalous items and find creative ways to use them against supernatural creatures. Without accidentally being abducted by a dark entity or suffering a bizarre anomalous effect, of course!

name: Jelly Express
description: Jelly Express is a two player co-op physics game. You will be playing two little jellies who will deliver boxes over obstacles to reach their destination. The only tool you have is a wooden board overhead, so use your ability to stretch, jump, and move to keep the boxes steady on the board.

name: Repulsor
description: Repulsor is a challenging 360° Retro Arcade Shoot 'em Up featuring a color-switching gameplay mechanic.

name: Astroworld
description: Astroworld is a side-scrolling co-op game where the players will have to build their colony on a planet full of danger, valuable resources and alien artifacts, using which the player can explore new technologies and equipment to arm their colonists with.

name: Aquarium Designer: Sea Life
description: Let the marine life thrive and create a wonderful undersea kingdom using saltwater fish, seashells, and corals. Accept new challenges and build fishtastic aquatic landscapes.

name: Wild Indigo Ranch
description: Wild Indigo Ranch is a cozy cowboy-life RPG for 1-4 players. Start a new life on the prairie, explore the frontier, build the finest ranch in the West, and ride into the sunset.

name: The Ball Flow: Nature and Light
description: Explore beautiful world! The ball use to carefully calculated physics. Change the ball's material for explore beautiful world smoothly. Enjoy and I deeply wish that you feel better after playing my game.

name: Airport Administrator Simulator
description: In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works.

name: Power (of) Metal
description: Power (of) Metal is a 2D hack/slash platformer, journey of Maleqqi who want to fulfill his emptiness inside of him and he will find the Power (of) Metal

name: Master of Pottery: Suzhou Garden
description: Enjoy a quiet time by making pottery in the garden.

name: Escape From Zombie U: Reloaded
description: If you thought the school system has reached its lowest levels... Think again!

name: Bound in Time
description: A heroic journey through time making friends along the way. Starting in the 1990s and launching yourself into the past and future. Full of nostalgic trips backwards and hopeful tomorrows. A love letter to the best JRPGs from the SNES era.

name: Fruit Farmer
description: Build your incredible farm! Create upgrades, get resources, create new types of fruits, sell what you have collected or create products from it! Explore an open world with lots of puzzles! Be the best farmer!

name: Tiltfire
description: Ignite your rocketship engines and zoom your way through the caves of tiltfire. Fly around tight corners and blast AI drones in this fast paced top-down shooter.

name: Warmonger: Sins of the Naga
description: Gunpowder and Sorcery Squad-Based Tower Defense game

name: Eros Fantasy
description: Eros Fantasy is an Idle RPG game full of magic and sex. Travel through a fantastic world, meet, seduce the hottest humans, beastfolks, demon girls and mermaids!

name: Colors! Platform
description: Colors! Platform is a minimalist casual platform game.

name: Tomorrow for Mar
description: Pass your final, graduate university and... finally confess?! Tomorrow for Mar is a 2.5D VN about crushes, tricky finals and starting a new chapter of your life.

name: Coloring Game 4: Steampunk
description: The twenty-first DLC for the game Coloring Game 4. The theme of this DLC is Steampunk.

name: Galactic Gym: Fitness Center Management
description: Can you run the galaxy’s greatest gym? Step into the shoes of a gym manager and fulfill the exercise dreams of your intergalactic customers! With equipment for numerous disciplines, varied exercise environments, and many employees to hire, you can create the best gym on this side of the Milky Way!

name: Cartographer
description: Cartographer is a turn-based game, where you decide how the world map looks. Build the map to build the world! The combat system is very simple and each enemy has its own attack pattern, which you can learn and exploit to defeat them in glorious turn-based battle!

name: Grimgrad
description: Build your settlement to survive all the hardships of the dark Middle Ages and not to anger the Slavic gods!

name: There's a Rikishi in my House
description: A casual escape game with 15 multiple endings.

name: Jishogi
description: A dark, story-heavy puzzle game. Enter the mind of Mayu, as her soul is invaded and dug through by a seemingly evil witch. Can you stop her? What if you were able to get the upper hand, and invade her back? Would you show mercy, or destroy her? Jishogi will test you in more ways than one.

name: Dominus Rage
description: Beat 'Em Up is a game in traditions of the old masters. Fight alone or with a company and beat up all your foes. Dominus feels that the Tavor has come back to life again. He returns to Altran, where his enimies are waiting for him.

name: Rich Lady's Slave Role Play
description: I reluctantly agreed to accommodate my difficult supervisor from the company I had worked before, but in return, she started to “play slave” as her payment, calling me “master” and occasionally stripping me of my clothes and putting her hands on me! What the hell was going on?!!!

name: La Vie La Rue
description: Cartoonish 2d game made by two brothers. Unique art all around these wonderful locations. Try and go to the furthest possible to beat your highscore and maybe be the first one to reach the end.

name: Ashgard: Tone Break
description: Play as the Norse goddess Idunn and explore a Midgard that has been entirely destroyed by the Ragnarök. Find and use your magical musical instrument "Himinnhorn" to reawaken the wondrous and magical melody trees that have been silenced and distorted by darkness.

name: Fallen London: The Queen of the Elephants
description:
An addon for Fallen London is add-on for Fallen London, a browser-based choose-your-own-adventure game set in "Fallen London", an alternative Victorian London with gothic overtones.

The Queen of the Elephants was the Exceptional Story for May, 2022.

name: Pokémon Luminescent Platinum
description:
Pokémon Luminescent Version is a mod for Pokémon Brilliant Diamond, inspired by the fantastic work of Drayano. Thousands of changes have been made to the base game, including (but by no means limited to) animation and texture changes, new forms for Pokémon coming from many other points of media such as Crystal Onix or Armored Mewtwo, the full Renegade Platinum main storyline (postgame upcoming), trade evolutions methods changed, more gift Pokémon throughout the storyline and so much more.

This is a mod made by the community, for the community, so anyone is free to join the Discord and apply to join the development team.

name: Boba Tale
description:
Welcome to Boba Tale! You are now a proud owner of a bubble tea shop! Start your adventure by making drinks for the folks in town, and upgrade your shop and drink recipes to build your boba empire.
Don't know where to start? Just follow your boba pals, and they will help you get started with your journey. Boba Tale is a relaxing and non-competitive boba life adventure. The world is yours to explore with endless upgrade combinations and town characters to meet.
Can you make millions by selling bubble teas? Let's see!

name: Sinister Adventures Bundle
description:
This bundle includes three amazing adventure games from Artifex Mundi:

- Endless Fables: Dark Moor
- Dreamwalker: Never Fall Asleep
- Scarlett Mysteries: Cursed Child

name: Bestiary Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: CrushBorgs
description: "Run and Gun" oldschool single-player platformer with NES aesthetics, including an authentic 8-bit chiptune.

name: Solitaire: Royal Mansion
description: Sin descripción

name: Matchpoint: Tennis Championships - Legends Edition
description:
Matchpoint: Tennis Championships is a modern take on tennis, featuring a true-to-life on-court experience supported by a deep career mode and unique rivalry system.

The game places a strong focus on tactical realism, positioning and aiming, allowing the player to move their superstar in exactly the right way to get the most out of their shots.

name: Drive Your Car
description: Sin descripción

name: Tomb of the Dash
description: Sin descripción

name: Rogue Lords: Day One Edition
description:
A dark fantasy roguelike where you play as the Devil!
Lead famous evil geniuses through events and turn-based fights to spread terror and corruption. Create synergies between your disciples, use your evil powers and take revenge on those miserable Demon Hunters.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - First Flight Edition
description: Take it to the skies and become a legendary dragon rider, with an extra jump start thanks to the Introduction Pack!

name: Frost Dragon in Wonder Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Rise of Kingdoms: Conquer War
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Grove + New Neighbears Bundle
description: Welcome to Cozy Grove, a game about camping on a haunted, ever-changing island. As a Spirit Scout, you'll wander the island's forest each day, finding new hidden secrets and helping soothe the local ghosts. With a little time and a lot of crafting, you'll bring color and joy back to Cozy Grove!

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Colossus Deluxe Edition
description: Unleash bestial power with a loaded heap of rewards. The high quality items included in this best-value pack will make your enemies shiver!!

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Complete Edition
description: Offering a discount set that includes the game, "Special Costume Set", "Season Pass", "Season Pass 2", and "Season Pass 3".

name: Little Mouse's Encyclopedia + Brawl Chess
description: Explore the natural world while learning through play, then compete with your family in greatest game of all time - chess! A great game for little ones, Little Mouse's Encyclopedia comes bundled with Brawl Chess!

name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts: Full Arsenal Edition
description: Become the ultimate assassin in Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts, a highly realistic modern warfare shooter featuring an immersive single-player campaign across large, open-ended maps. Tactical thinking, high-stealth movement, and extreme precision required.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Fellow Edition
description: Stand out from the crowd with the Fellow Pack - an epic heap of dragons, customisations and consumables fit for every true dragoneer who want to leave their mark in the history of Century: Age of Ashes.

name: Blaston Spectator
description: View and stream Blaston matches with broadcast-quality tools so that your audience never has to miss a moment of the action! Built with streamers and esports fans in mind, Blaston Spectator gives PC owners everything they need to keep an eye on the action of VR’s hottest competitive dueling game.

name: JumpBeard
description: Challenge awaits you in this platformer journey, where you take control of one legged captain called Rupert the JumpBeard in your tactical jumping adventure where your only way to go is upwards to find a mythical treasure but be wary, every missed jump will result in a fall back where you started.

name: Into the Dark
description: Action-Oriented Dungeon Crawler RPG

name: Major League
description: After Timur and Roger are fired from the bank, they decide to work for Krusslin. They have to choose between the stock market ambitions of the mafia and gangs and their own reality.

name: Formula Top
description: Fun top-down 3D formula racing game with tense side-by-side battles against competitive AI or other people in online multiplayer. The perfect blend of tight arcade controls and immersive world of formula.

name: Roburst
description: Roburst is a multiplayer competitive VR game. Create your own remote control robot and fight to become the best Roburst Figther!

name: One-Armed Cook
description: One-armed Cook is a chaotic co-op cooking game for up to 4 people. Work as a team or cook on your own, set your own pace, and don't let the stress of a full restaurant catch up to you. The goofy physics-based aspect of the game gives this cooking game a new twist.

name: Twisted Draw
description: Twisted Draw is a card based strategy game set in a medieval realm where the Necromancer threatens to wipe out life as we know it. Collect and command powerful units and spells to keep the hordes of undead at bay.

name: Aery: Vikings
description: Aery: Vikings is a story-driven 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bird that is on its non-violent journey to complete a shire impossible task of the gods. Make your journey through a wonderful, peaceful, and exciting world and enjoy the feeling of flying.

name: The Heroic Legend of Eagarlnia: Expansion Pack
description: The DLC of include four new forces, Yan and Kaze，Ikaris and Herricido.

name: Triga
description: Slap triangular tiles down in this cause and effect, chain reactive, radically funky puzzle experience! Collect as many golden triangles as you can to unlock new levels, but don't sweat it if you aren't a triangle-brained genius: Each stage has 3 goals ranging from casual fun, to extreme puzzling!

name: Epic Battle Fantasy Collection
description: A collection of short and silly games from the early days of the internet. There's turn-based RPGs, shoot-em-ups, platformers, and more - updated with new quality-of-life features. Plus there's a whopping 150 achievements to collect!

name: Closer Than You Know
description: A cozy, modern spin on the old point-and-click adventure games. Packed with story and puzzles, this adventure centers around young Sam. She's on a big quest to save her home planet--where Hope has been outlawed.

name: Moi Mei: Hidden Objects
description: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you, in the role of a young priestess Mei, will have a journey into magical space. Search for talismans and ingredients for rituals, enlist the help of cunning and greedy Voodoo spirits to save your beloved!

name: The Last Secret
description: Light-hearted visual novel adventure with an epic tale - with challenging and fun puzzles, humorous storyline and quirky characters. Solve the "last secret", save your friends and maybe find true love on the way, too...

name: Island of Aito
description: Island of Aito is an interactive survival / item management / dating simulator game with visual novel elements.

name: Space Ducks: The Great Escape
description: In this cosmic puzzle adventure, help a lost tribe of duck-people in their millennial quest for a stable world!

name: Creature Hunter
description: Produce powerful spells with the loot you collect. Destroy creatures that get stronger at each level with collective or single spells. Defend yourself with defensive spells. Cross deadly parkour with the spells you've crafted.

name: Crafting Town
description: Crafting Town Is : A Crafting game with Simulation&Building where you can Craft and Develop your Village, Source Management and Quests.

name: Santo Island Incident
description: Overgrowth took over the whole Santo Island and facility as a result of an unknown incident. Your mission is to find out the source of the incident and solve what's happened at Santo Island.

name: Space City: Build Your Empire
description: A sci-fi turn-based strategy that will make you immerse yourself in a new world.

name: Hero's Quest: Automatic Roguelite RPG
description: Simple RPG game with incremental progress

name: Change: A Homeless Survival Experience - Living City Expansion
description: Create your own story and explore all the new buildings, items, perks and characters in this huge expansion for Change: A Homeless Survival Experience.

name: The Unsettled
description: The Unsettled is a first-person Psychological Horror game. You as an Investigative Journalist, Got Intel about a Missing girl in a Boarding School, but it reveals something more Evil and Scary.

name: Liberty Castle: Home of the Free
description: As The success of Freedom Castle hinges on the strength of the community, our focus will always be centered around creating a positive environment for attracting original thought. Our intent is to bring out peoples innate desires for open discussion and immersive social experience.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Hit the Wall
description: Have you ever thought how much damage your car can take?

name: Moros Protocol
description: Your mission is not just to survive, but to face yourself, your past and prepare for "a world full of darkness and monsters". A stylized pixel painted FPS roguelike game, that combines the feel of early action-adventure games, with innovative mechanics.

name: Per Aspera: Blue Mars
description: The Blue Mars DLC introduces players to new, ocean-size bodies of water and all the benefits that come with them! You've changed the face of the Red Planet with the Green Mars update - now let's go for blue!

name: Soul Wargame
description: This is a dark style strategy game that combines Wargame and Rogulike. Everyone received a mysterious invitation after destroying the conspiracy of the cult. You will lead a group of undead warriors on an adventure journey to defeat invincible enemies one by one.

name: Aza: Zend vs. The Dark End
description: Help Zend save himself the Dark End and his anxieties, in this Narrative-driven Action-RPG shrouded in darkness. Discover and customize new abilities, save the lives of others, hack, slash, and power your way through mysterious creatures from the darkness, and learn just who the secretive Aza is!!

name: Vaxomon
description: Vaxomon is a psychological horror based on Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Explorers of Darkness and has many fixed dungeons during gameplay.

name: Escape Dark Tunnels
description: Escape Dark Tunnels is a puzzle game where the player gets trapped underground being chased by mysterious creatures. You will have to use your ingenuity and logic to escape from the tunnels.

name: Tratritle
description: A little master lived happily with his maids. But what bothered him was that the maids were too naive and simple. One day, he received a letter from his father. He thought he could solve the current problem... But unexpectedly, another succubus maid came. Will he still be a good boy or...?

name: Me and My Eldritch Parasite
description: You have an eldritch parasite. It sucks. Find a way to get rid of it while meeting its demands in this strage mix between sidescrolling horror, virutal pet and sarcasm.

name: Guardians: Agents of Justice
description: Guardians: Agents of Justice is a cancelled superhero squad tactics game developed in 1996/1997. The game was supposed to play like X-Com, but with superheroes.

name: Total Conflict: Resistance
description: Total Conflict: Resistance is a unique symbiosis of global strategy, tactics and first-person action. Realistic mass battles, many types of armored vehicles, weapons, uniforms, unique mechanics, immersive free gameplay. Lead any state and bring it to greatness!

name: Armageddon War: Old Era Wreckers
description: This is a turn-based historical chess simulation game Players will experience major battles between 1840 and 1920 The game consists of four conquest scripts, each with three different modes and 60 free conquest years to choose from, where the player takes on the role of a commander

name: Connected Hearts: Fortune Play - Collector's Edition
description: Love can wound and heal. It is a feeling inherent in everyone. But can you get love by force or deception? Find out in this new game!

name: The Medical Examination Diary: The Exciting Days of Me and My Senpai
description: Would you like to start the love romance by your senpai that you desired? "The medical examination diary: the exciting days of me and my senpai" is the novel game.

name: Bloodied Fear
description: Poor Joe. His wife left him and his son was killed in a tragic accident. Now he's been tasked with rescuing the King's daughter. Unfortunately for the bad guys, Joe's in a really pissed off mood.

name: La Jetée
description: ‘This is the story of a man marked by an image from his childhood.’ An 30minute black noire game, with an deep story, 30 beautiful images and stunning backroundsound.

name: Search and Rescue
description: Turn-based, strategy board game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue and Survive!

name: ShadowBringer
description: Escape the underground research facility and discover the truth of your origin. ShadowBringer is a 3D stealth game where you take on the role of a shadowy monster. Awakened with no recollection of the past, a voice in your head whispers softly to you: "Get out of this place".

name: Run n Jump
description: Run n Jump your way through dangerous obstacles to save the lost maiden at the top. Find yourself dropped into a treacherous world running full speed while trying to avoid being massacred by the obstacles in your way. Do you have the skill to rescue the lost maiden?

name: Sunline
description: Sunline is a first-person 3D free-running game that follows Ana, a rebellious teen in the solarpunk city of Elyria, as she saves the city from a crushing storm.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Orbital Mechanics is a sci-fi, third-person shooter, single player game in which the player jumps between spherical asteroids whilst combating enemy forces.

name: Hexfactory
description: Build cities and factories in an infinite Hex World. Explore more tiles. Balance your city's production and consumption, attract more citizens of different classes, research new technologies and build more factories and cities.

name: Spell Welders
description: Play as 1 of 17 different welders in this strategic turn-based RPG! After you choose your spell, decide how you will cast it. Will it be fast? Accurate? Powerful? You've never had control like this before as you weld your way to victory!

name: Caution
description: Caution is a platform game about a caution sign that performs its function masterfully, until a garbageman hijacks it and puts it in a garbage truck. The sign, which in turn, has sworn revenge against the nefarious garbageman.

name: Fix Me Up: Hospital Edition
description: Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a Doctor?

name: Rhythmic Keyboard
description: Rhythmic Keyboard is a music-based typing game with integration of a talent system that allows for the player to increase their effectiveness. Procedurally spawned keys inhibit pattern formation, so reaction speed and hand/eye coordination are a priority -- not memorization.

name: Heroes Rally
description: "Heroes Rally" is a casual strategy tower defense game. By building defense towers with different characteristics, casting spells, and commanding heroes to repel all enemies who will commit crimes in the future!

name: Endless Bullet Heaven
description: In this endless bullet avoidance game, you join the fallen angel named Brace in her fight to survive the heavens in which she once resided!

name: Bomber Boom
description: Bomber Boom is a multiplayer game It is played between 2 - 4 players in an arena on which player it is, this player beats by placing bombs and it is played in 3 rounds The last one left in the arena wins the first round the first to accumulate three rounds in a row wins the game

name: Zombie Slaughter VR
description: The world is in danger. Make your way to the evacuation center, take part in the great battle for survival, and discover the cause of the invade!

name: Terra Puzzle 3D
description: Assemble the planet Earth as a spherical jigsaw puzzle in full 3D and at 3 levels of difficulty.

name: Happy Hops
description: Endless hopping fun! Relax and unwind by jumping between Lilly-pads to earn points. Earn bonus points for collecting lotus flowers. Collect enough to earn new high scores! Supports controllers and keyboard controls

name: 8/8/88 Needle AL
